success_criteria: All 39 tests pass (100%), no console errors, field IDs resolve correctly

problems.description: changeSetting() searches for fields using wrong order. Tests use kebab-case IDs (admin-bar-bg-type) but helper searches name attribute first (admin_bar[bg_type]). This causes 20+ 'Field not found' errors.
problems.impact: 20+ tests fail with 'Field not found: admin-bar-bg-type' errors
problems.immediate_fix: Reverse search order in changeSetting(): try ID first (kebab-case), then name attribute, then convert kebab-case to array notation
problems.long_term_fix: Create field mapping configuration file that maps test field names to actual HTML IDs/names. Add validation to ensure field names match HTML structure.

problems.description: Variable 'linearBg' used in console.log but never defined. Same pattern in 5 other locations in this file.
problems.evidence: console.log(`  Linear gradient: ${linearBg}`); // ReferenceError: linearBg is not defined
problems.impact: 6 test failures in gradient.spec.cjs due to undefined variable references
problems.immediate_fix: Add page.evaluate() calls to define variables before using them in console.log or assertions
problems.long_term_fix: Add TypeScript or JSDoc type checking. Create helper method getComputedBackground() to encapsulate common pattern.

problems.description: Variable 'originalHeight' and 8 other height variables used but never defined
problems.impact: 9 test failures in height.spec.cjs due to undefined variable references
problems.immediate_fix: Add page.evaluate() calls to get height values before using them
problems.long_term_fix: Same as problem #2 - add type checking and helper methods

problems.description: Variable 'largerFontSize' and 3 other typography variables used in assertions but never defined
problems.impact: 4 test failures in typography.spec.cjs due to undefined variable references
problems.immediate_fix: Add page.evaluate() calls to get computed styles before assertions
problems.long_term_fix: Same as problem #2 - add type checking and helper methods

problems.description: Tests try to hover over #wpadminbar elements which don't exist on settings page. Admin bar is only visible in main admin, not on settings page.
problems.impact: 10+ tests timeout waiting for non-existent elements
problems.immediate_fix: Remove or skip hover tests for admin bar elements on settings page. Settings page is for configuration only.
problems.long_term_fix: Create separate test suite that navigates to actual admin pages (dashboard, posts, etc.) to test live admin bar appearance and interactions.

problems.description: saveSettings() waits for success notice with 3 second timeout, but AJAX operations may take longer. Also doesn't fail gracefully if notice doesn't appear.
problems.impact: Tests fail even when save succeeds, just takes longer than expected
problems.immediate_fix: Increase timeout to 10 seconds and make success notice optional (don't fail if it doesn't appear)
problems.long_term_fix: Implement proper AJAX completion detection by monitoring network requests and jQuery.active status. Add retry logic for flaky operations.

problems.description: Test assumes templates exist but doesn't verify. May fail if no predefined templates are loaded.
problems.evidence: Assertion failed: Should have at least one predefined template. Expected true, got false
problems.impact: 2 tests fail when templates/palettes aren't loaded
problems.immediate_fix: Add verification step to check if templates exist before trying to apply them. Skip test gracefully if none found.
problems.long_term_fix: Create test fixtures that ensure templates and palettes are always available. Add database seeding for test environment.

problems.description: Screenshot function tries to set quality parameter for PNG format, but quality is only supported for JPEG
problems.evidence: page.screenshot: options.quality is unsupported for the png screenshots
problems.impact: 5+ warnings in test output, doesn't break tests but clutters logs
problems.immediate_fix: Only add quality parameter when format is JPEG or JPG
problems.long_term_fix: Add format validation in config and provide clear error messages if invalid options are used

problems.description: File has JavaScript syntax error preventing it from loading
problems.evidence: Failed to load test metadata: Unexpected token 'const'
problems.impact: 1 test suite completely fails to load
problems.immediate_fix: Check file for syntax errors, likely missing closing brace or parenthesis

steps: 3. Look for 'const' declarations that might be in wrong scope
4. Run through linter (eslint) to identify exact issue
5. Fix syntax error and verify file loads

problems.long_term_fix: Add pre-commit hooks with ESLint to catch syntax errors before they're committed. Add CI/CD step to validate all test files load successfully.

tasks.task: Fix field ID lookup in helpers.cjs
Fix undefined variables in admin-bar tests
Remove/skip hover tests on settings page
Increase timeouts and improve error handling
tasks.impact: Reduces false failures on slow operations
Prevents failures when templates not loaded

tasks.task: Run full test suite and verify

verification_steps: 1. Run single test: node tests/visual-interactive/runner.cjs --test admin-bar/colors
4. Run full test suite: node tests/visual-interactive/runner.cjs
7. Check console for any remaining errors

if_tests_fail: 2. Verify tests work on previous commit
4. Apply fixes incrementally with testing between each

summary.root_cause: Field ID lookup logic searches in wrong order, causing cascade of failures. Secondary issues are undefined variables and missing existence checks.
